Wensi Wu

  • publications

I am a Postdoctoral Fellow at the Children's Hospital of Philadelphia. My research focuses on utilizing imaging-derived computational modeling strategies to better understand the underlying mechanisms within the context of congenital heart defects. To that end, we can systematically explore possible surgical repair procedures to improve surgical outcomes for children affected by heart anomalies.
